Title: libarchive: Multiple Vulnerabilities
Synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libarchive, the worst of which could result in denial of service.

Background.Text: libarchive is a library for manipulating different streaming archive formats, including certain tar variants, several cpio formats, and both BSD and GNU ar variants.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libarchive. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All libarchive users should upgrade to the latest version:
